Text: enough seeders for my taste, but can someone confirm??

Don't waste your time.  Original d/l from Skidrow has no skidrow folder as instructed to use for the crack.  Only skidrow folder with crack is in update, but that doesn''t work and it says not to use it anyway.  Complete bogus download & waste of time

Mate, I did everything you said

d/l and installed black ops 2 skidrow

d/l and installed update

then i copied the entire contents from the black opps 2 torrent into the installation folder

Then downloaded and copied the contents from the soundfix torrent

When you do this... the soundfix torrent has an application in it too..... if you copy that into the installation folder... it wont even bloody load mate..... if you put the original crack back... it loads maybe 1 out of 10 times if im lucky, then freezes at the " dolby " screen

help plz??!!!???!!???
